alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Erath; Hamilton; Hood; Parker; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Somervell, central Hamilton, eastern Erath, southern Parker, western Bosque and Hood Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lipan to near Hamilton. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Granbury, Hamilton, Pecan Plantation, Willow Park, Aledo, Glen Rose, Brock, Western Lake, Meridian, Hico, Annetta, Lipan, Iredell, Cranfills Gap, Dinosaur Valley State Park, Squaw Creek Reservoir, Meridian State Park, Oak Trail Shores, Bluff Dale and DeCordova. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Texas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bosque; Erath; Hamilton; Hood; Parker; Somervell
